channel.title: Comments on: I just started Iki Island and I love how beautiful the game is ❤️

item.title: By: Ne0guri
item.dc:creator: Ne0guri
item.description: Iki does a great job of completing Jin’s backstory, loved this game very much. I think I’m gonna go play and again NG+ Lethal.
item.content:encoded: Iki does a great job of completing Jin’s backstory, loved this game very much. I think I’m gonna go play and again NG+ Lethal.

item.title: By: ypeels40
item.dc:creator: ypeels40
item.description: Loved ghost despite some of the repetitive stuff. Iki Island went by too quick. Felt like a few hours. But my profile said it took about 13 hours
item.content:encoded: Loved ghost despite some of the repetitive stuff. Iki Island went by too quick. Felt like a few hours. But my profile said it took about 13 hours

item.title: By: ZedErre
item.dc:creator: ZedErre
item.description: Looks nice, hoping to get it down the line.
item.content:encoded: Looks nice, hoping to get it down the line.

item.title: By: das6992
item.dc:creator: das6992
item.description: Enjoy! This is one of those DLCs that was 100% worth every penny for me. It really added on to the base game and added enough new stuff. Loved it.
item.content:encoded: Enjoy! This is one of those DLCs that was 100% worth every penny for me. It really added on to the base game and added enough new stuff. Loved it.

item.title: By: NiNj4_C0W5L4Pr
item.dc:creator: NiNj4_C0W5L4Pr
item.description: Just wait. I'm excited for you. (I'm not going to say anymore).
item.content:encoded: Just wait. I’m excited for you. (I’m not going to say anymore).

item.title: By: xizar
item.dc:creator: xizar
item.description:
I'm frustrated as I ordered this on the 10th of September and still haven't gotten it.
(I refuse to cancel the order and try again, as I have a discount for some reason and $3 is $3.)
item.content:encoded:
I’m frustrated as I ordered this on the 10th of September and still haven’t gotten it.

(I refuse to cancel the order and try again, as I have a discount for some reason and $3 is $3.)

item.description: When can you access Iki island?
